title: Review Prior Year Return for Audit Risk
description: A new client wants their previous year's tax return, prepared by someone else, reviewed for potential audit risks.

tasks.description: Scan the prior year tax return into the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully digitizes the tax return.

tasks.description: Analyze the return for common audit red flags, such as unusually high business expense deductions or missing forms.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies that the Schedule C auto expenses are disproportionately high for the reported income.

tasks.description: Advise the client on the potential risk and recommend gathering supporting documentation in case of an audit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the risk and provides actionable advice.
